long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Play more games on the top-left menu.

ğŸŒ€ Relive the high-speed adventures of everyone's favorite blue hedgehog with the official Chrome extension â€“ Sonic Original! ğŸ®âœ¨ Burst through loops, collect rings, and defeat Dr. Robotnik in this timeless classic brought to your browser. ğŸƒğŸ’¨ Feel the rush of nostalgia as you speed through iconic zones and face off against familiar foes. ğŸŒŸ Immerse yourself in the pixel-perfect world of Sonic, now conveniently accessible in your Chrome browser. Install Sonic Original and race against time as you rediscover the magic of the original Sonic the Hedgehog game. ğŸŒğŸ•¹ï¸ Let the Sonic adventure begin!
